Hi Oliver, I don't think it hurts to point to your blog on here if you us=
e your judgment regarding the relevance of the posts.  Even if they are not=
 explicitly about NEAT/HyperNEAT they may touch on topics of interest here =
like plasticity.  But I wouldn't stray too much off the general issues of c=
oncern to neuroevolution.  Note that this group is actually run by Derek Ja=
mes, who has done a great job for many years, so his view of this question =
is likely the "official" word.

Good luck on your Ph.D.,

ken
